result.execSummary:
The defendant Audie W L Ridgeway was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Knowingly Violate a Domestic Abuse Order - Injunction [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse Assessments], an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 813.12(8)(a).
  • Knowingly Violate a Domestic Abuse Order - Injunction [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse Assessments], an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 813.12(8)(a).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

CONCURRENT AS TO BOTH COUNTS and  CONCURRENT with Revocation Sentence in 15CF18, with credit for 1 day time served

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Audie W L Ridgeway in court with attorney Adam c Essling.  Defendant Audie W L Ridgeway in custody.  Benjamin Calvin Verhulst appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant is serving a revocation sentence.
AS to counts 1 and 2:    Defendant was advised of constitutional rights and maximum penalties, waived all rights, and plead GUILTY.  Defendant examined as to the plea.  Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights and Addendum received and filed.  Stipulation by parties to complaint as a factual basis to sustain the plea.  Defendant further advised that if he is not a US citizen, deportation is possible.  Court found the defendant guilty. Judgment of conviction entered.
Court orders counts 3 and 4 dismissed and read in for sentencing.
Sentencing proceeded.  Statements by counsels and defendant.
The court orders the defendant to serve 6 months House of Correction, each count, CONCURRENT AND CONCURRENT WITH REVOCATION SENTENCE IN 15CF18, with credit for 1 day time served.
The court orders defendant to pay all applicable costs, fees, assessments and surcharges, DNA and costs by 1-9-2017 and failure to do so will result in entry of civil judgment.
CASH BAIL ON DEPOSIT TO BE APPLIED.  Defendant remanded.
CR233 filed.

Attorney Adam c Essling in court, defendant Audie W L Ridgeway not in court, in custody.  Owen M. Piotrowski appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant is at Dodge Correctional and was not produced for today's date.  Defense is requesting a plea/sentencing date.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for January 7, 2016 at 08:15 am.

Attorney Adam c Essling in court, defendant Audie W L Ridgeway not in court, in custody.  Porchia Sharese Lewand appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant was to be present for today's date but was moved to Dodge Correctional and was not produced.  COURT ORDERS THAT DEFENDANT BE IN COURT FOR THE TRIAL DATE OF MONDAY DECEMBER 14 AT 8:15am

Attorney Adam c Essling in court, defendant Audie W L Ridgeway not in court, in custody.  Nicolas J Heitman appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant recently sentenced in a case in Kenosha County. Defense counsel requested a plea/sentencing date. Case adjourned in branch 38.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for December 11, 2015 at 08:15 am.
Defense counsel is requesting a new FPT date as defendant has another matter scheduled on 11-19-2015.

Defendant Audie W L Ridgeway in court with attorney Adam c Essling.  Nicolas J Heitman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defense has received discovery and an offer.   Case set for final pretrial on 11-19-2015 at 8:15am.  Jury trial set for 12-14-2015 at 8:15am.  All final pretrial documents to be filed by the final pretrial hearing.  All motions to be filed by 10-6-2015.  ls  Final pre-trial scheduled for November 19, 2015 at 08:15 am.  Jury trial scheduled for December 14, 2015 at 08:16 am.

Defendant Audie W L Ridgeway in court.  Benjamin Verhulst appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court held financial colloquy with the defendant.  Court ordered the defendant to go to the State Public Defender Office. Case adjourned for status of counsel in Branch 38.  Status conference scheduled for September 15, 2015 at 08:15 am.
The defendant did go the State Public Defender Office.  Per a telephone called from the State Public Defender Office, the defendant does not qualify for public defender representation.

Defendant Audie W L Ridgeway in court.  Elizabeth Longo appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for pre-trial conference. Defendant does not have counsel. For reasons stated on the record Court ordered the defendant to go to the State Public Defender Office. Case adjourned to Branch 38.  Status conference scheduled for September 8, 2015 at 08:15 am.
Petition for Appointment of Counsel, Affidavit of Indigency and Order filed by Defendant.
